src_original: trividhāṃ śīlaśikṣāṃ ca kuśaladharmasaṃgraham //  sattvārthakriyāśīlaṃ ca pratigṛhṇāmy ahaṃ dṛḍham //
vajraghaṇṭāṃ ca mudrāṃ ca pratigṛhṇāmi tattvataḥ //
caturdānaṃ pradāsyāmi ṣaṭkṛtvā tu dine dine //  mahāratnakule yoge samaye ca manorame //
mahāpadmakule śuddhe mahābodhisamudbhave //  saṃvaraṃ sarvasaṃyuktaṃ pratigṛhṇāmi tattvataḥ //  pūjākarma yathāśaktyā mahākarmakuloccaye //
